other_title: Locke the Superman: Millennium of the Witch
Locke, El Superman de las Galaxias (Spanish)
plot: Colonel Yamaki is searching for Locke, an esper with powers far beyond imaginable. He is supposed to enroll him on a mission to investigate Lady Kahn, a millionaire tycoon who is raising an army of espers for an unknown reason.
ending_theme: "Hoshi no STRANGER" (星のストレンジャー) by STR!X
